Title: Feta Spinach and Red Pepper Egg Bites
Ingredients: 1 small yellow onion, diced and sauteed
Instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees, and grease a muffin pan.
Divide the vegetables among 6 muffin cups. Add a bit of feta to each cup.
In a medium bowl, mix the eggs, salt and pepper. Pour the eggs into each of the 6 prepared muffin tins.
Bake for 12 to 14 minutes. Allow to cool and refrigerate until ready to eat.
